info.name: Powerfox - UI improvements for Firefox power users
info.description: This is a simple collection of tweaks for Firefox that make it a little awesomer for power users, or just those who would like a little more out of their browser UI. This only affects Firefox, and does not affect the rendering of any websites.
info.additionalInfo:
Version: 1.0

Requirements: Firefox 4+ on any operating system

List of Features:
-display close buttons on all hovered tabs
-shrink tabs to their icons before scrolling them (like Chrome)
-automatically hide back/forward buttons when they are disabled
-keyword field in bookmark button panel (via the star to the right of the URL bar)
